title: Rugby rouses me
creator_credit: Peter Fletcher, David E. Barrow, John Leake, Peter Johnson, Film Australia and Motion Picture Associates
brief_description: Explores the game of Rugby in Australia at many levels and reveals the dedication, even fanaticism that Rugby engenders alike in players, organisers and supporters. Follows the stages of junior competition, selection trials, state and international competition. Also shows the camaraderie and life-long friendships that are built up amongst the players.
